title: Угадай мелодию
overview: Follow "Guess the melody" is a musical television game, the essence of which is to guess the song or artist by the sounding melody. The latest project of Vlad Listyev. The game consists of three rounds and super games. Three people are playing. In the first round, four categories are given, in the category of four "notes" worth from 10 to 100 rubles ...
